Address.value: 450 LEXINGTON AVENUE,FLOOR 13 13TH FLOOR, NEW YORK, New York, 10017, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Brixmor Property Group Inc is a real estate investment trust based in the United States. The company owns and operates a portfolio of grocery-anchored community and neighborhood shopping centers across the United States. It leases its rentable areas to retailers, restaurants, theatres, entertainment venues, and fitness centers, with the company's tenants consisting of large department stores, discount retailers, and grocery stores.
